thread.title: Penn National Gaming Shareholders Approve Pinnacle Entertainment Acquisition

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Penn National Gaming Shareholders Approve Pinnacle Entertainment Acquisition

organizations.name: penn national gaming shareholders approve pinnacle entertainment acquisition

text:
March 29 (Reuters) - Penn National Gaming Inc:
* PENN NATIONAL GAMING SHAREHOLDERS APPROVE PINNACLE ENTERTAINMENT ACQUISITION
* PENN NATIONAL GAMING SHAREHOLDERS APPROVE PINNACLE ENTERTAINMENT ACQUISITION
* PENN NATIONAL GAMING - AT SPECIAL MEETING, ABOUT 86% OF PENNâ€™S OUTSTANDING COMMON SHARES WERE VOTED
* PENN NATIONAL GAMING - ABOUT 99% OF VOTES CAST IN FAVOR OF PROPOSAL TO ISSUE SHARES OF CO TO PINNACLE STOCKHOLDERS IN CONNECTION WITH DEAL
* PENN NATIONAL GAMING INC - PENN AND PINNACLE CONTINUE TO EXPECT DEAL CLOSING WILL OCCUR IN SECOND HALF OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
